sentences.en: It is one means by which university committees assess and approve your research candidature.
sentences.cn: 这是招生委员会衡量并采用研究人员的方法之一.

sentences.en: This notice should be used a nominated candidate who wishes to withdraw his candidature.
sentences.cn: 获提名而欲退出选举的候选人,须填写此通知.

trans.tran_cn: 候选人身份，候选人资格
